goals.complete: I received a mysterious message, promising information about my parents if I met with the anonymous sender. It's risky, but it may be the only way to find out what really happened to them.

goals.active: Meet with the informant about your parents.
goals.complete: I met up with the mysterious informant, only to find an ambush! With the help of Salia and Mehid, agents for the Shining Blade, we defeated the assassins. Salia and Mehid believe that the assassins are actually White Mantle cultists tied to an investigation they were pursuing. Their next mission is to break into a cultist cell, and they agreed to take me along.
